programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Tamir, Charlie, Julia, and Cookie Monster are making self-portraits in the community garden with Kayla. Kayla guides them to look into the mirror and notice the beautiful things that make you, you! Everyone looks at themselves in the mirror and starts drawing what they see. They also learn their identity is about what you love to do. So, they add onto their self-portraits and then share their drawings with each other. Cookie Monster draws his blue fur, his googly eyes, and cookies. Charlie draws her blue eyes, curly blonde hair, tap shoes, and challah bread because it’s one of her favorite Jewish foods. Julia draws her straight hair, musical notes, paw prints, and her dog Rose. Elmo draws his red fur, orange nose, a piano, and watering a flower with Abby because being a kind neighbor is part of Elmo’s identity. Tamir draws his brown skin, coily hair, comic books, and some veggies as he loves gardening in the community garden. There are so many special things that make you, you!

programme.desc: This time the team tries to figure out if the Jurassic's most vicious predator was involved in the deaths of super-sized beasts like the iconic Diplodocus which are buried at the site, helping to reveal why so many dinosaurs came here, and what killed them in such great numbers 150 million years ago.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather 5
programme.desc: In Tennessee, a river breaks its banks. In Canada a Tornado rips through a construction site. And in Papua New Guinea, a rain flooded river raises the danger levels.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs 1
programme.desc: An orphaned baby Triceratops, must outwit a deadly T. rex. Can she survive?

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins 1

programme.title: Wonders of the Human Body with Michael Mosley 1

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories 1
programme.desc: Tea ceremonies of the past inform present day rituals - including a breath-taking outdoor tea ceremony for 100 people on the banks of a river in Taiwan. The skills and passion of the world famous Rock Tea producers are celebrated in a blind-tasting competition.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq 1
programme.desc: Michael Palin embarks on a 1000 mile adventure into Iraq, a country he has never been to before. He boards a train in the spectacular snow-capped mountains of Lake Hazar in eastern Turkey, the source of the river Tigris, which Michael will follow until he reaches the Persian Gulf on the southern most coast of Iraq.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: A Kiss Before Christmas

programme.title: ALF S1 E25 - La Cucaracha
programme.desc: It's out-of-this-world mayhem, mischief and madness for the whole family when ALF, 'Alien Life Form' crashes into the Tanner family's world.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E20 - First Date
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E24 - Goodbye Eddie Cain
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: V: The Final Battle E05 - Part V
programme.desc: The resistance group struggle to find weaknesses of the aliens they can exploit. In addition, not all the aliens feel their invasion was right, and they too work to stop the war.

programme.title: Cheers S4 E06 - I'll Gladly Pay You Tuesday
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E01 - A Pocket Full of Rye (Part 1)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E02 - A Pocket Full of Rye (Part 2)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: CSI S4 E09 - Grissom Versus the Volcano
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: The Lilian Velez Story, Till Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: She was a famous young soprano turned movie actress, while he was a former child actor trying to make it as a leading man. They made a good pair on the screen. He loved her and saw their team-up as salvation of his waning career. Unable to accept the truth, he stabbed her to death one evening.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Boy Buluran: Head Hunter Ng Maynila
programme.desc: Ronnie Ricketts, played the title role in the true story of Sgt. Boy Buluran, whose clever way with disguises and massive information network brought down a syndicate of bank robbers.

programme.title: Wala Na Bang Pag-ibig?
programme.desc: For years, they have been the best of friends. Gemma is bratty Eric’s buddy, and to some extent, accomplice in his not too few escapades. But what if one day, all of a sudden, Gemma feels something different for Eric?

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Mahal Ko
programme.desc: The King of the Philippine Movies and the Star for All Seasons team up in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy. FPJ and Vilma Santos meet in the most bungling of situations and they become fast enemies.

programme.title: Ma'am, May We Go Out (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey were lazy bums who would inherit a fortune if they would be able to graduate from high school. It was not easy but it helped that the P.E. teacher is Carmi Martin.

programme.title: Kasalanan Bang Sambahin Ka
programme.desc: As a last fling before getting married, Alex (Julio Diaz) dates his friend's cousin Catherine (Vivian Velez). When Alex still marries his fiancee Grace (Dawn Zulueta), Catherine makes life difficult by creating a scandal.

programme.title: Ex-Rebel
programme.desc: Concerned with his pregnant wife Saling, rebel leader Ka Leon decides to take advantage of the government's amnesty program to rejoin society. But Ka Leon's past catches up with him.

programme.title: Bad Boys Gang
programme.desc: Daang Buenaventura, head of the bad boys gang (and an avid follower of Robin Padilla, hence the similar ways and manner of his everyday lifestyle) prefers living in jail rather than enjoying the free life at the young age of 17.

programme.title: Lipa "Arandia" Massacre
programme.desc: In the movie, Vilma played the role of Helen Arandia, who was brutally murdered along with her two daughters in Lipa, Batangas. The movie is not a massacre movie per se but which main thrust is on the beautiful love story of the couple.

programme.title: Tag-Araw, Tag-Ulan
programme.desc: A woman who was running away from the pain of a broken love affair. A young man who was looking forward to a fun-filled summer and his first sex experience.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Tokyo's Tama River is the site of an exciting quest to film the parenting behaviors of the ever-elusive Japanese weasel. Imagine our surprise at finding a mother raising pups right under our noses!

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Tokachi is in Japan's great northern land of Hokkaido, home to vast fields and sprawling pastures. Experience its vibrant summer colors through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Photographer Komatsu Yuka has been documenting the lives of Syrian refugees who fled to Turkey to escape the conflict in Syria, only to now once again find themselves displaced by earthquakes.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 2
programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 3
programme.desc: Our buyers go to war to win a locker packed with valuable vintage surf gear. Then, Brandon and Lori get stuck with a busted bin, but when they find a glass case filled with an unidentifiable goo, they're left wondering if this unit smells like moneyor just plain stinks. And later, the day's final auction unleashes a bidding war so medieval, someone will have to be carted away.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Watch a guy pass out on an amusement park ride, a wild spring break fight, and the weirdest use of a Roman candle in the history of fireworks. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 13
programme.desc: A container riddled with bullets, a burned-out box, and a freak accident on the lot put everyone on edge, until an out-of-this-world discovery leads to the biggest win yet.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 4
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to score a locker packed with rare movie memorabilia. Then, Papa Bear and T-Money each scoop up low-grade bins, but when they each start to sift through their individual messes, one of them finds a childhood dream-come-true. Andlater, the day's final auction sparks an intense bidding war, but when one of our buyers shoots the moon on his bid, it leaves everyone else wondering exactly where all of this cash is coming from.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 5
programme.desc: Our buyers lock horns to win a unit packed with valuable construction equipment. Then, Brandon and Lori spot something that no one else does, but they'll have to play it cool if they want to walk away with this golden score. And later, the day's final locker smells of gas and cash, but leads to a showdown that gets one of our buyers banned from the auction.

programme.title: East New York S1 9
programme.desc: The 7-4 investigates the suspicious death of a retired cop who was planning to go public with claims of corruption.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 7
programme.desc: Lois and Clark dig deeper on Bruno Mannheim, starting with his connections to Hob’s Bay Medical Center, while Jonathan and Jordan panic at home over Lois’ dire diagnosis.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 01
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for removing pet hair, grilling without charcoal, and opening a wine bottle without a bottle opener. Plus, they'll uncover the best pool party hacks, and craft a hack-filled defense against the rugged outdoorsman.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 2

programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to score a locker packed with rare movie memorabilia.
